thread.title: Romelu Lukaku's Tweet During The Champions League Fuels Transfer Speculation
thread.title_full: Romelu Lukaku's Tweet During The Champions League Fuels Transfer Speculation

title: Romelu Lukaku's Tweet During The Champions League Fuels Transfer Speculation
text:
Romelu Lukaku's Tweet During The Champions League Fuels Transfer Speculation Tue Feb 21 2017 23:37:18 GMT+0000 (GMT) Tue Feb 21 2017 23:37:18 GMT+0000 (GMT) Jack Kenmare Jack Kenmare in football 
Romelu Lukaku has been linked with a move away from Everton for months, but despite 'interest' from a number of European clubs, nothing has ever materialised. 
The Everton striker has been linked with a move to former club Chelsea, as well as Juventus and Paris Saint Germain, and it looks like his latest cryptic tweet is a call for any potential suitors. 
But there's one condition - you will need to in the Champions League. 
During the Manchester City vs Monaco game tonight, the Belgian said: "UCL is where reputations are built... what a competition. What a game." Lukaku has admitted in the past that he has unfinished business with former club Chelsea, and this latest tweet has left lots of people talking about his future at Goodison Park. UCL is where reputations are build... what a competitionWhat a game :blush::fire: - R.Lukaku Bolingoli10 (@RomeluLukaku9) February 21, 2017 
Here are some reactions from the tweet: @RomeluLukaku9 leave Everton then
